metadata.name: DAY ONE
metadata.description:
DAY ONE is a digital animation created in 2022 by stacking 37 digitally hand drawn frames into one seamless loop. It is the first piece available in the THOUGHTS ON LOOP series by PHRAZE. 

In this series, quotes take the form of seamless loops of minimal typographic forms. These loops are designed to serve as visual mantras, meant to be repeated. 

We remember, forget, and remember again. 

Artwork information: GIF, 4000x4000, 37 frames, 256 colors, 15fps, 2022.
